pullrequest.title: Publish robot's initial pose for amcl

content.raw: @chapulina is working on an alternative to just give the robot position in the new task response rather than baking in amcl specific topic publishing in the competition plugin. A follow-up could be to pass only the room info and let the competitor code decide where in the room initialize localization (not a static obstacle, navigatable area etc)
